@graph.name: Eteria Route Optimization Integration - Fleet Management - Route4Me
@graph.description: Integrate Eteria telematics with Route4Me for real-time fleet tracking, route optimization, and driver performance monitoring. Streamline last mile operations.
@graph.keywords: Eteria integration, Route4Me telematics, fleet tracking, route optimization, GPS vehicle tracking, driver performance, last mile delivery, fleet management, telematics gateway, vehicle monitoring, dispatch optimization, proof of delivery

@graph.name: Eteria Telematics Integration for Route4Me
@graph.description: Connect Eteria telematics with Route4Me to track vehicle locations, monitor driver performance, and optimize routes in real-time. Know the location of your assets every minute of the day while measuring actual performance against planned routes. Create routes optimized to the unique aspects of your business, dispatch to drivers with a single click, and capture proof of delivery with notes, e-signatures, barcodes, and images.

@graph.name: Contact for Eteria Integration
@graph.description: Fill out the contact form to set up Eteria telematics integration with your Route4Me account

@graph.name: Real-Time Tracking
@graph.value: Know the location of your assets every minute of the day, monitor stop status, measure actual against plan

@graph.name: Route Optimization
@graph.value: Create routes optimized to unique business aspects, set constraints, visualize on interactive maps

@graph.name: Dispatch Capabilities
@graph.value: Dispatch routes to drivers with single click, driving directions and stop instructions on mobile apps

@graph.name: Proof of Delivery
@graph.value: Capture proof of delivery with notes, e-signatures, barcodes, voice recordings, images, and videos

@graph.name: Operational Efficiency
@graph.value: Reduce planning, driving, fuel and maintenance costs, automate route optimization for higher fleet utilization
